name: Toofy in Fan Land
overview: Oh no! Someone has stolen all Toofy's nuts and scattered them in a strange and mysterious maze in the weird and distant Fan Land. Toofy must have his nuts and so sets off to Fan Land to retrieve them. When he gets there though, his world is turned upside-down ... literally! Guide Toofy in search of his 51 nuts scattered about Fan Land, and keep an eye out for secret rooms - not that you can see them - they're secret after all!
